overview: Van Darkholme delivers yet another twisted tale - Mechanic Mayhem! Mechanic Derek is magically transformed into a leather god by the Zeus belt buckle left on the passenger seat of a car he is servicing. He reeks havoc on his fellow mechanics singling out dream boy in bondage Clint, for punishment and sling fucking. The Zeus transformation continues as Lars Svenson gets racked and relentlessly lubed to the edge of orgasm. Finally, Ricky and Tyler battle it out in a greasy wrestling/bondage match with an oil soaked fuck climax. You'll be grabbing for your own grease!
title: MECHANIC MAYHEM
